attributes.action: the doctor involved in the baby p case should be forced to leave the health care profession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the doctor cannot see when a child has a broken back and broken ribs how can that doctor be trusted to diagnose other people properly. the bad judgement shows that this doctor is not capable of doing the job and should be forced to leave the health care profession.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
